questions.quote: All right. I'm gonna try givin' them fifty-five dollars each...  What do you think?
...so I called the litterbug a pig, not you. I like policeman. I wanted to be a policeman.
You understand the Santa's at Bloomfields are making double what you are?
You see I disagree. I'd rather be dating the blind. You know you could let the house go. You could let yourself go. A good looking blind woman doesn't even know you're not good enough for her.
Friends. Yeah! Why not friends? I might like to try that! Like you an' Jerry!
It's raining? It's raining. The game will be postponed. We'll play tomorrow.
You're an errand girl, sent by grocery clerks, to collect a bill.
Pretty impressive--"Serious boyfriend '92 to '95." Owns her own car.. "Favorite president: James Polk!"
Oh, check it out. I guarantee you've never seen anything quite so objectionable. It's down the hall, third door on your left.
Yesterday, took the day off.  Now, from the time I left the room...
